snippet: There are pluses and minuses to collapsing oil prices. A California bill would require retailers and restaurants to pay double on holidays. A salad chain manages to attract tech investors.
abstract: There are pluses and minuses to collapsing oil prices. A California bill would require retailers and restaurants to pay double on holidays. A salad chain manages to attract tech investors.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: 'Mean People Fail'
